narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor define the topic of study?
comments: Good basics course, I would've like to spend more time on the different cueing programs and their intricacies.
I think Erich is a great teacher. He s very clear and patient. The class is constructed very well and the handbook that we have is also very helpful in case you missed a subject.

narratives.question_text: How clearly did the instructor outline the expectation for the course, classroom activity and homework?
comments: Everything was on the syllabus, but sometimes we wouldn't remember to talk about the next assignment early enough before it was due.
Erich made it very clear in the syllabus what are his expectations from the students. And I think his assignment are reasonable and well constructed.
Some projects were vague, but Erich did a good job of a) explaining why they were vague and b) explaining what exactly he wanted us to do in the context of that vagueness.

The homework ended up being much more time consuming than I prefer when compared to how much I felt I learned from the assignments. Part of this was because there were so many assignments, and each one had elements that we did not cover in class. I think having some parts of this is good, but overall I felt there was too much trying to figure out what the assignments were calling for.

narratives.question_text: How well were individual class sessions prepared and presented?
comments: Those powerpoint were on point!
Some if the lectures had a lot of info to digest in one session, though.
Erich is always prepared with the equipment needed for the class.

Erich used powerpoint very effectively where appropriate and did not where not appropriate, structured the class quite well, and has a good lecturing style. Sometimes moved a little fast but was always willing to go back.

narratives.question_text: How well did lectures fit within the boundaries of the course?
comments: Lectures were all useful and on-topic

Worked well with the balance of all of the other work I had to do, but when just thinking about the class I think another project like the Final would've been useful to do after getting feedback on how you did the final project. That project was when things started to click for me, but whether or not I was truly doing it right will be a variable until we get them back.
generally the workload was ok, but is a very helpful thing that Erich was willing to give me an extension when I had an overload with all the other assignments in school
Homework was useful and educational without being a burden.

narratives.question_text: How available was the instructor for help outside the classroom?
comments: Erich's door is always open for any question. He is very generous with his time, and have a great energy
Erich goes out of town more than most professors but is always accessible via email and more than happy to chat when he is around.

narratives.question_text: How useful were assignments in furthering an understanding of the topic?
comments: I wish we would've gone over everyone Isadora's projects just to get a broader knowledge of the different ways to use that program.

narratives.question_text: If tests were given, how fairly did they measure knowledge gained?
comments: The midterm gauged the material covered in the first half of the class quite well.

narratives.question_text: How useful was this course in preparing you for production work?
comments: I didnt get to use this knowledge in my production assignment yet but I got the general idea of patching network in the rep
I definitely feel qualified to cobble together a projection system with a certain degree of trial and error, more so than I had expected to.

narratives.question_text: How would you evaluate the instructor's knowledge of the material?
comments: I'm not sure if Erich has written a textbook on projection engineering, but he could.

narratives.question_text: Please offer additional comments on such topics as: what worked best about the course, suggested improvements, class materials, etc.
comments: If there was a system that could send an automatic email with the next class classroom, it would have been very helpful. I was often confused with the location of the class.
